metadata.name: CHROMA1#01
metadata.description: Source **CHROMA-I** token **#1** of **20**. This token has not been built into the definitive artwork yet. The current owner can build it at [collec-code.com](https://collect-code.com/), where the contract and owner's address and block hash will be used as seed. This **Source token** has the hability to **control the collection supply**. Learn the rules at [collec-code.com](https://collect-code.com/chroma1).
